Uses of Interface
org.jvoicexml.interpreter.FormItem

Packages that use FormItem
org.jvoicexml.interpreter This package contains the core interpreter. 
org.jvoicexml.interpreter.form This package contains classes imlementing ExecutableForms that are interpreted. 
org.jvoicexml.interpreter.formitem This package contains classes imlementing FormItems that can be visited by the form interpretation algorithm. 
org.jvoicexml.interpreter.tagstrategy This package contains strategies to execute a VoiceXML node, implementing TagStrategy. 
 

Uses of FormItem in org.jvoicexml.interpreter
 

Methods in org.jvoicexml.interpreter that return FormItem
 FormItem FormInterpretationAlgorithm.getFormItem(String name)
          Retrieves the form item with the given name.
 

Methods in org.jvoicexml.interpreter that return types with arguments of type FormItem
 Collection<FormItem> FormInterpretationAlgorithm.getFormItems()
          Retrieves all form items of the current form.
 Collection<FormItem> ExecutableForm.getFormItems(VoiceXmlInterpreterContext context)
          Retrieves all FormItems, defined in this form.
 

Methods in org.jvoicexml.interpreter with parameters of type FormItem
 void TagStrategy.execute(VoiceXmlInterpreterContext context, VoiceXmlInterpreter interpreter, FormInterpretationAlgorithm fia, FormItem item, VoiceXmlNode node)
          Executes the strategy with the current parameters.
 void FormInterpretationAlgorithm.executeChildNodes(FormItem item)
          Execute the tag strategies for all child nodes of the given form item.
 void FormInterpretationAlgorithm.executeChildNodes(FormItem item, NodeList list)
          Execute the TagStrategy for all nodes of the given list.
 void FormInterpretationAlgorithm.executeChildNodes(FormItem item, VoiceXmlNode parent)
          Execute the TagStrategy for all child nodes of the given parent node.
 

Uses of FormItem in org.jvoicexml.interpreter.form
 

Methods in org.jvoicexml.interpreter.form that return types with arguments of type FormItem
 Collection<FormItem> ExecutablePlainForm.getFormItems(VoiceXmlInterpreterContext context)
          Retrieves all FormItems, defined in this form.
 Collection<FormItem> ExecutableMenuForm.getFormItems(VoiceXmlInterpreterContext context)
          Retrieves all FormItems, defined in this form. Creates an anonymous field, which does not exist in the document.
 

Uses of FormItem in org.jvoicexml.interpreter.formitem
 

Classes in org.jvoicexml.interpreter.formitem that implement FormItem
 class AbstractFormItem
          Form items are the elements that can be visited in the main loop of the form interpretation algorithm.
 class BlockFormItem
          A sequence of procedural statements used for prompting and computation, but not for gathering input.
 class ControlItem
          Implementation of a control item.
 class FieldFormItem
          An input item whose value is obtained via ASR or DTMF grammars.
 class InitialFormItem
          This element controls the initial interaction in a mixed initiative form.
 class InputItem
          Implementation of a input item.
 class ObjectFormItem
          This input item invokes a platform-specific object with various parameters.
 class RecordFormItem
          An input item whose value is an audio clip recorded by the user.
 class SubdialogFormItem
          A <>subdialog> input item is roughly like a function call.
 class TransferFormItem
          An input item which transfers the user to another telephone number.
 

Uses of FormItem in org.jvoicexml.interpreter.tagstrategy
 

Methods in org.jvoicexml.interpreter.tagstrategy with parameters of type FormItem
 void IfStrategy.execute(VoiceXmlInterpreterContext context, VoiceXmlInterpreter interpreter, FormInterpretationAlgorithm fia, FormItem item, VoiceXmlNode node)
          Executes the strategy with the current parameters. Find the child nodes to execute and execute them.
